ED_Title: Report of the Economic and Social Council
ED_DecisionText:
At its 29th plenary meeting, on 9 October 2017, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Economic and Social Council. 

(See A/72/3; A/72/PV.29)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/72/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
